description: However Israel stressed the "localised and pinpoint measures" would "not detract from the fighting".
maintext: It has also rejected the UN's warnings of a humanitarian crisis in Gaza, arguing that there is sufficient food, water and fuel despite the "complete siege" it imposed in response to Hamas's attack, and has rejected its calls for a ceasefire unless the hostages are released.
title: US says Israel to begin daily four-hour military pauses in Gaza
